member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.CsvInputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the input endpoint for CSV/TSV files.
member.remarks: For possible options please refer to https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/java/org/apache/spark/sql/DataFrameReader.html

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.CsvInputEndpoint.Files
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of files, in particular, the files with CSV or TSV extensions.

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.CsvInputEndpoint.InferSchema
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether the schema should be inferred from the raw data.

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.CsvInputEndpoint.Multiline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether a record in the file could span multiple lines.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.EmptyInputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the input endpoint that doesn't read any data.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.JsonInputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the input endpoint that reads data from JSON files.

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.JsonInputEndpoint.Files
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON files.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.MultiDataSourcesInputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the input endpoint that accepts a JSON text that represents the settings of multiple data sources.

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.MultiDataSourcesInputEndpoint.Json
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON text that contains the settings of multiple data sources.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.SqlServerDataTableInputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the input endpoint that reads data from Microsoft SQL Server database.

member.name: T:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.TextInputEndpoint
member.summary: Represents the input endpoint that reads data from text files.

member.name: P:Abacuza.Endpoints.Input.TextInputEndpoint.Files
member.summary: Gets or sets the text files.
